data.name: Worlds Of The Future
data.detailed_description:
Worlds Of The Future is a futuristic open world, 3rd person single player, action/adventure game. The game is set in a bright, vibrant and fun version of our solar system in the year 2500. Explore a fully seamless solar system full of adventures, mysteries and colorful characters. Build your space delivery company from the ground up, climb the solar system company rankings and become a legend among the worlds!

Objective

Start and grow your new space delivery company by completing deliveries and tasks for various companies around the solar system. Expand your company by hiring, managing and commanding your own crew onboard your very own freighter ship. Fly out in your shuttlecraft to land on planets, space stations and more to explore, complete tasks and deliver packages to your customers.


Gameplay

Go on awesome adventures exploring a huge, fully seamless solar system. Fly through space, into a planet's atmosphere and walk on its surface, all without any loading screens. Explore huge futuristic cities, shoot up space pirates and alien enemies, chill in a bar after a long day of deliveries, and much more in the open solar system.


Story & Progression

Explore the solar system, full of exciting mysteries and stories, meet colorful characters, and make friends and enemies as you ascend the ranks to solar system legend status! Choose your own path: Will you abide by the law, or break it? Every mission choice and success influences how factions, and the law, respond to you. Build your reputation and relationships with factions and contacts you meet throughout your journey.


World

Worlds Of The Future is heavily inspired by Futurama and Star Trek. We take a lot of inspiration from the bright futuristic worlds both shows created. Making the world immersive and feel like an existing place that the player can feel a part of, is a big focus for us. That means having in-world companies & brands, prolific characters, unique locations & landmarks and more - Be a part of this world by making a name for yourself!

data.short_description: Worlds Of The Future is a sci-fi open world, action/adventure game. Explore a fully seamless solar system full of adventures, mysteries and colorful characters. Build your space delivery company, climb the company rankings and become a legend among the worlds!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K@2.9GHz / AMD FX 6300@2.9GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 (3 GB) / AMD Radeon R9 290 (4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum specifications may change during development in Early Access.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K@3.5GHz / Ryzen 5 1500X@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 (6 GB) / AMD Radeon RX 580 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended specifications may change during development in Early Access.
